source:
path = 'wasbs://cosmolnksynp@synapse1poc.blob.core.windows.net/cosmolnksynp/Products.csv'
dfProdcutstest = spark.read.csv(path, header=True, inferSchema=True)
dfProdcutstest.write\
    .format("cosmos.oltp")\
    .option("spark.synapse.linkedService", "RetailSalesDemoDB")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.container", "Products")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.write.upsertEnabled", "true")\
    .mode('append')\
    .save()

path = 'wasbs://cosmolnksynp@synapse1poc.blob.core.windows.net/cosmolnksynp/RetailSales.csv'
dfRetailSales = spark.read.csv(path, header=True, inferSchema=True)
dfRetailSales.write\
    .format("cosmos.oltp")\
    .option("spark.synapse.linkedService", "RetailSalesDemoDB")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.container", "RetailSales")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.write.upsertEnabled", "true")\
    .mode('append')\
    .save()

path = 'wasbs://cosmolnksynp@synapse1poc.blob.core.windows.net/cosmolnksynp/StoreDemoGraphics.csv'
dfStoreDemoGraphics = spark.read.csv(path, header=True, inferSchema=True)
dfStoreDemoGraphics.write\
    .format("cosmos.oltp")\
    .option("spark.synapse.linkedService", "RetailSalesDemoDB")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.container", "StoreDemoGraphics")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.write.upsertEnabled", "true")\
    .mode('append')\
    .save()
